page.title: 05SECONDERY SCHOOL
page.content: {SECONDARY SCHOOL} After the Primary School,we go to Secondary School for 5 years.Ours is the Honywood Community School because it has classes for the whole community.Children have a different teacher for every lesson.In the Secondary School children have a timetable to show their lessons for a week.New Science and Computer labs. are being built on to the Sports Hall. There is a year tutor for each year and students go to him for registration every day.Dinners are on Self-Service and you can buy what you like.There is a wide selection of food and drink.Sports at the Honywood are different.They do Athletics,Rugby, Hockey,Football,Cricket,Tennis,Netball and Basketball.The library is part of the County library.There is a vast selection of books including books for younger children and adults.
